text: They completely didn't make my online order and then proceeded to tell me they make it when you arrive... I was waiting for over an hour for 2 pizza.. who ever is managing the online and take out orders is incapable of managing the order load was struggling very very badly.

name: Matthew Morgan
text: I'm a huge fan of Blaze Pizza. As a chain, it's been very consistent across every location I've visited. I'm sold on the variety of toppings that are available. I had sausage, pepperoni, ricotta, parmesan, mozzarella, and oregano on my pizza, and it was delicious!

name: Raymond Harris
text: Probably thr best pizza in lompoc! Staff are pretty friendly!

name: Melissa Zebley
text: Loved seeing the different crust options.. original,  cauliflower,  and keto. The cauliflower crusty is tasty and crispy.

name: Keith Feickert
text: The 'Subway of Pizza' has arrived in Lompoc! With a warm toned ambiance with imagery of La Purisima Mission and a gorgeous fire for the pizzas, Blaze offers quick, filling pizzas that you can easily customize with the ingredients right in …More

name: Kita Sperow
text: Order 2 pizzas online and picked up at the store. The location was clean. Staff was polite. My order was ready on the time that the app said it would be. I would definitely come back. Good was cooked right no issues at all.

name: Molly B
text: Friendly staff that work quickly and efficiently. The young lady who built my pizza was very helpful and even offered suggestions to make my pizza even better! I got the white top pizza that comes topped with arugula; amazing value for just $9!

name: Javier Roman
text: Great place with build your own option including unlimited toppings very fresh and delicious. Will be coming here from now on. Cons: No Wings.

name: Aldo G
text: First time here. The associate willie was so helpful and nice. Made my lunch experience exceptional.

name: Alyssa Berroteran
text: Pizza was delicious. No complaints for my first time going.

text: Very good pizza! I love that i can build my own pizza and 1 price for unlimited toppings.

name: Luciano Hayes
text: First time going and gotta say it was a blast! Willie was very outgoing and respectful when it came to me ordering.

name: Thomas Pisculli
text: This is place is amazing. Great taste and it's fast! I recommend the Red Vine with extra sauce and extra cheese.

name: Randon Mullins
text: Its okay for what it is. Not my favorite but then again nothing here is.

text: I really enjoy Blaze Pizza.  In my opinion this pizza is very unique, simple, yet delicious - completely made to your satisfaction.  Even more important the organization has done a great job in putting together a team of employees that …More

text: Making your own pizza with a wonderful choice of side salad is a bit of heaven. Service was very good and amiable. Location was clean. Loved it.

text: Such a cool concept! Build your own pizza. Lots of awesome choices at reasonable prices.

name: Steve Boothby
text: Great tasting pizza at a great price! This place is hard to beat for fast, good, healthy food for not much money. They offer gluten free, and their topping selection is great. If you haven't tried them you're missing out!

name: Luis Rodriguez
text: The pizza was good, the salads are great. Good times.

text: Their Pizza is amazing, I suggest only making it in store since they do not have a warmer and the one time I place the time order they made it early and my pizza was super cold.

text: Limited menu but a lot of choices with topics and drinks.   Pizza made your way (like Subway you pick the toppings) and flat prices.   Pizza is thin crust/Italian style.

text: Went for PI Day, was crazy busy, staff did great at moving the line. I ordered the green strip pizza, pesto sauce n chicken, etc. To be honest I wasn't that impressed. However, since it was crazy busy that day, I'll cut them some slack. Maybe I'll go back when it's not so crazy, and try again!
